data.text:
Sonic Soundspeed: The Animated Series is an American animated action television series based on Sonic the Hedgehog in video games, tv shows and comic books. In this show, this timeline will be different and it will have new characters, settings and key events.

Synopsis[]

Protagonists[]

Team Sonic/Team Heroes[]

Sonic The Hedgehog (Roger Craig Smith)

Muttski (Dee Bradley Baker)

Miles "Tails" Prower (Colleen Villard) - The Main Deuteragonist who is Sonic's best friend and sidekick on many adventures who pilots the "X-Tornado". He is also a young prodigal genius in terms of mechanics and science, and can fly using his twin tails.

Beast Boy (Greg Cipes) - Tails' sidekick and assistant

Ivan Peek (Mark Hamill) Sniper (Ken Bower)

Reworp "Sliat" Selim/Perry (Aiden Sussman)
